abstract: On a night of mostly low-rated repeats, the third installment of “Clash of the Choirs” gave NBC a modest bump in the ratings on Wednesday.
snippet: On a night of mostly low-rated repeats, the third installment of “Clash of the Choirs” gave NBC a modest bump in the ratings on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: On a night of mostly low-rated repeats, the third installment of “Clash of the Choirs” gave NBC a modest bump in the ratings on Wednesday, as the two-hour episode led the 8 p.m. time slot among adults 18 to 49 while drawing an average of 8.3 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: Choir Competition Gives NBC a Lift
